Reference

All functions

AFM.flatten()

flattens an AFM image using a plane fit

AFM.histogram()

graph a histogram for the AFM image

AFM.import()

Imports AFM file

AFM.info()

find AFM image information, much of the information is specific to the AFM instrument; common pieces are included with the tag INFO

AFM.isImage()

checks if the object is an AFM image

AFM.lineProfile()

Line Profile

AFM.raster()

returns raster data frame

AFM.read()

loads AFM image file

AFMdata() AFMdata()

AFM image class

AFMinfo()

AFMinfo object

AFMinfo.item()

returns an item from the AFMinfo object

NID.checkFile()

checks AFM NID file length

NID.loadImage()

DEPRACATED: returns the scaled image + flattend image

NID.loadSweep()

loads frequency sweep data from NID file

flatten.NID_matrix()

DEPRECATEDD: use AFM.flatten() instead: flattens a NID AFM image using a plane fit

get.NID_imageInfo()

returns number of lines for each image

initialize(<AFMdata>)

Constructor method of AFMImage Class.

plot(<AFMdata>)

graph of AFMdata object

print(<AFMdata>)

print essential information about the AFMdata object

read.AFM_file()

DEPRECATED: use AFM.read() loads AFM image file

read.AR_eofHeader.V2()

returns the version 2 header information tagged at the end of the AR file, which includes several tags including the $DataTypeList and $NumberOfFiles ex: "HeightRetrace,AmplitudeRetrace,PhaseRetrace,ZSensorRetrace,"

read.AR_file()

load Igor wavefile

read.AR_file.v2()

loads Asylum Research Igor AFM wavefile

read.AR_header()

loads AR header

read.AR_header.v2()

loads Asylum Research Igor Wave AFM header information

read.IBW_file()

DEPRECATED: use read.AR_file() loads Asylum Research Igor Wave AFM files

read.NID_file()

DEPRECATED: use AFM.read() loads images of AFM NID file (use NID.loadImage whenever)

read.NID_headerItems()

loads header of NID file and separates into items first item in list has the titles of the others

read.NanoSurf_file()

loads images of AFM NID file (use NID.loadImage whenever)

read.NanoSurf_header()

loads header of NanoSurf AFM NID file and returns parameters for particular image

read.NanoSurf_header.v2()

loads header of NanoSurf AFM NID file and returns parameters for particular image

read.Nanoscope_file()

Returns Veeco NanoScope AFM image with Scaling

read.Park_file()

loads images

read.Park_header.v2()

loads Park Image header

summary(<AFMdata>)

summary of AFMdata object

summary(<AFMinfo>)

summary for AFMinfo object
